mapper.select:
SELECT
from ( SELECT
from c_menu where state = 1 and is_general = 1 and resource_type = '20' UNION ALL SELECT
from c_menu where state = 1 and is_general = 0 and id in ( SELECT distinct authority_id FROM c_role_authority ra INNER JOIN c_user_role ura on ra.role_id = ura.role_id INNER JOIN c_role r on r.id = ra.role_id where ura.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.state = 1 and ra.authority_type = 'MENU' and c_menu.resource_type = '20' ) ) tmp ORDER BY sort_value asc
